_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The process of disillusionment and freed: Growing disillusioned with sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts
The understanding of a learned noble dis: The spiritual journey has been completed
What had to be done has been done
There is no return to any state of existence
